title: The gouerance and preseruation of them that feare the plage. Set forth by John Vandernote, phisicion and surgion, admitted by the kynge his highenesse. Now newly set forth at the request of William Barnard of London Draper. 1569
author: Noot, Jan van der, ca. 1538-ca. 1596.
publicationStmtPublisher: By Wyllyam How, for Abraham Veale, in Paules churchyeard at the signe of the Lambe,
